sentences.sentence: Because of the surgery, your recovery time may be longer than if you delivered your baby vaginally.
sentences.translation: 如果选择剖腹产，你的恢复时间要比自然分娩要长一些。

sentences.sentence: Most women, whether they deliver vaginally or by C-section, don't have serious problems from childbirth.
sentences.translation: 大多数的母亲，无论是顺产还是剖腹产，生产时都没有大问题。

sentences.sentence: Size A is recommended for women who have given birth vaginally or who have had a caesarean section and are aged 30 or above.
sentences.translation: 推荐顺产生孩子或已进行了剖腹产手术并为30岁或以上的女性使用。
